response.overview: Raken, a common thug that Solaria put in jail years ago, has just broken out. His first stop is a man known as Mr. X who claims to have a steroidal serum. Raken takes possession of the serum and sets up camp at an abandoned warehouse. Solaria tracks him down but she has no idea what she's about to encounter. His anger has grown exponentially after 8 years inside, and he has his sights set on destroying Solaria. Not expecting his strength, she struggles and after a good fight, he overpowers her. He's bested her physically, but that's not enough. He wants to humiliate and overpower her sexually, so completely that she ends up giving in to her dark side, allowing her desires to unwillingly show themselves. How far does he take his revenge plot, and is she strong enough to resist her own darkness?
response.title: Payback
